Mission and Purpose

The Centre for Citizenship, Globalization and Governance (C2G2) at the University of Southampton engages in 'problem-based research' on the multiple challenges to contemporary citizenship at all levels of governance. C2G2 is a core partner in the development of participedia with staff, doctoral and masters students participating in its development.
